timeline.bodyText: Delete this line. It does nothing. Initialization is only required for final fields. Other fields default to 0/null. Ditto below.
timeline.author: ejona86

timeline.bodyText: Why is this synchronized? I don't think this class can be used from multiple callers/threads.
timeline.author: ejona86

replies.bodyText: You are right. I was just being cautious :)  synchronized removed.
replies.author: jiangtaoli2016
